# React Native Expo WebView & Video Player App

This is a React Native Expo application that features:
- WebView integration with local notifications
- HLS video streaming with custom controls
- Modern UI with component libraries
- TypeScript implementation

## Key Technologies
- Expo SDK 54.0.0
- React Navigation v6
- TypeScript
- expo-av for video playback
- expo-notifications for local notifications
- react-native-webview for web content

## Architecture Guidelines
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement proper TypeScript typing
- Follow React Native best practices
- Use Expo managed workflow features
- Implement proper error handling and loading states

## Code Style
- Use meaningful variable names
- Add proper comments for complex logic
- Implement proper error boundaries
- Use consistent styling with StyleSheet
- Follow accessibility guidelines
